nodes.text: Factryn meat pie was a savory Wookiee delicacy. The pie was made from the meat of the factryn species and edible by Humans and Wookiees. Around 2 BBY, at the wedding of the Wookiees Chewbacca and Mallatobuck on the planet Kashyyyk, factryn meat pie was served on a table among other Wookiee delicacies. The Human smuggler Han Solo noted that it was among the safe Wookiee foods that were not too spicy for Human consumption.
Factryn meat pies appeared in the 1997 novel Rebel Dawn, written by A. C. Crispin as the third novel in The Han Solo Trilogy.
